titleStmt.title: The Queene leying in state who departed this life the 28 day of december 1694 to the great greefe of all good subiects.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sould by Joh: Overton att the White horse without newgate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "With mourning pen, and melting eyes,".
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Joh: Overton att the White horse without newgate
